A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Dreadful film all around.  Dreadful new characters from "Rose the annoying" to "Porgs: the obvious attempt to sell plushies".  

What I can't understand is how the audience score is not at 30%.  Disney must be bankrolling the executives at Rotten Tomatoes to ensure that the reviews don't fall below 50%.  No other explanation would suffice.

This movie deserves zero stars for the horrible new characters\, plot holes galore and terrible dialogue.  I gave it 1 star for the music and scenery.  And for some solid performances by Driver\, Ridley\, Issacs\, Boyega and of course\, Hammil and Fisher.
